title: Dark essence fragments

properties.name: description
properties.value: Dark essence fragments are items created by using a chisel on dark essence blocks, providing 8 Crafting experience per block. Each block will create 4 pieces of essence, which are used to runecraft blood and soul runes. Players cannot hold more than 108 fragments at a time, with 111 at a maximum if a stack of 108 is picked up while holding a stack of 4+. The fragments cannot be stored in a bank. Dark essence fragments vanish upon death.

Item ID7938

Dark essence fragments are items created by using a chisel on dark essence blocks, providing 8 Crafting experience per block. Each block will create 4 pieces of essence, which are used to runecraft blood and soul runes. Players cannot hold more than 108 fragments at a time, with 111 at a maximum if a stack of 108 is picked up while holding a stack of 4+. The fragments cannot be stored in a bank. Dark essence fragments vanish upon death.

  • Blood runes can be made at 77 Runecraft (can be boosted) and will provide 23.8 experience per dark essence fragment.
  • Soul runes can be made at 90 Runecraft and will provide 29.7 experience per dark essence fragment.

[[File:Dark essence fragments detail.png|left|120px]]
'''Dark essence fragments''' are items created by using a [[chisel]] on [[dark essence block]]s, providing 8 [[Crafting]] experience per block. Each block will create 4 pieces of essence, which are used to [[runecraft]] [[blood rune|blood]] and [[soul rune]]s. Players cannot hold more than 108 fragments at a time, with 111 at a maximum if a stack of 108 is picked up while holding a stack of 4+. The fragments cannot be stored in a bank. Dark essence fragments vanish upon [[death]].

*[[Blood runes]] can be made at 77 Runecraft (can be boosted) and will provide 23.8 experience per dark essence fragment.

*[[Soul runes]] can be made at 90 Runecraft and will provide 29.7 experience per dark essence fragment.
